title: ****1 room in 2 bedroom apt near KENDALL/HARVARD****
posting_body: I'm looking for a roommate to fill my 2-bed 1-bath condo-style (two floors!)
apartment for an unheard of price of $1,050/month in Union Square, Somerville on the Cambridge/Harvard Sq line!
Walk to Harvard/Porter/Central or the 87 bus.
Super clean apartment with a good amount of space.
Rent hasn't gone up since I moved here in 2019.
Looking for a fellow clean, quiet, working professional.
I am 34 years old and my crazy days are behind me.
Enjoy playing music in my rented space, reading, hiking, flipping on a record and sharing the occasional dinner with a roommate while respecting their space.
